error.info:
'''Warning:''' This action has been automatically identified as harmful.
Unconstructive edits will be quickly reverted,
and egregious or repeated unconstructive editing will result in your account or IP address being blocked.
If you believe this action to be constructive, you may submit it again to confirm it.
A brief description of the abuse rule which your action matched is: Possible vandalism by adding badwords or similar trolling words

messages.name: abusefilter-warning
parameters: Possible vandalism by adding badwords or similar trolling words
